p: Gardenine ( 36, Fig. 10), obtained from the investigation of crude extract of the aerial parts of Canthium multiflorum (Rubiaceae), harvested from Cameroon, exhibited antiplasmodial activity against the K1 strain of P. falciparum, with an IC 50 value of 32.12 μM and weak cytotoxicity against L6 cell lines [ 69].
